title: Shooting in Huntington ruled accidental
content:
UPDATE: According to an alert from Marshall University, the Huntington Police Department has determined the reported shooting to be accidental. There is no ongoing threat related to this incident.
ORIGINAL: The Huntington Police Department is searching for a suspect after a man is shot in Cabell County Tuesday night.
According to dispatchers, the shooting was reported around 11:30 p.m. We're told it happened in an alley behind the Speedway on 6th Avenue.
The victim was taken to the hospital with a gunshot wound to his arm. Dispatchers tell us the injury is not life threatening.
No name is being released at this time.
Stay with 13 News on air and online as we continue to follow this developing story.
